user.description: Provide the IP address for your LIFX Ceiling.

data_description.host: The hostname or IP address of your LIFX Ceiling.

zeroconf_confirm.description: Do you want to add an uplight and downlight to {label} ({group})?

error.invalid_device: Device is not a LIFX Ceiling

set_state.name: Set State
set_state.description: Adjust the hue, saturation, brightness or kelvin of either the uplight or downlight of a LIFX Ceiling.

transition.name: Transition
transition.description: Duration it takes to get to next state.

hs_color.name: Hue/saturation color
hs_color.description: Color in hue/sat format. A list of two integers. Hue is 0-360 and Sat is 0-100. Cannot be used with 'Color temperature'.

color_temp_kelvin.name: Color temperature
color_temp_kelvin.description: Color temperature in Kelvin between 1500 and 9000. Cannot be used with 'Hue/saturation color'.

brightness.name: Brightness value
brightness.description: Number indicating brightness, where 0 is off, 1 is the minimum brightness, and 255 is the maximum brightness.
